lead_paragraph: Viktor Troicki swept past Aleksandr Nedovyesov 6-2, 6-3, 6-4 as Serbia defeated Kazakhstan 3-2 in their first-round Davis Cup tie Sunday. The winner will face Britain in the next round.
snippet: Viktor Troicki swept past Aleksandr Nedovyesov 6-2, 6-3, 6-4 as Serbia defeated Kazakhstan 3-2 in their first-round Davis Cup tie Sunday. The winner will face Britain in the next round....

headline.main: Djokovic-Led Serbia Beats Kazakhstan 3-2 in Davis Cup
headline.print_headline: Djokovic-Led Serbia Beats Kazakhstan 3-2 in Davis Cup
